mapper.select: SELECT point_id, user_id, point_amount, type_detail, created_at, total_amount, type FROM Point WHERE user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BINARY, javaType=java.util.UUID} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT point_id, user_id, point_amount, type_detail, created_at, total_amount, type FROM Point WHERE user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BINARY, javaType=java.util.UUID} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Point ( point_id, user_id, point_amount, type_detail, created_at, total_amount, type ) VALUES ( #{pointId, jdbcType=BINARY, javaType=java.util.UUID}, #{userId, jdbcType=BINARY, javaType=java.util.UUID}, #{pointAmount}, #{typeDetail}, #{createdAt}, #{totalAmount}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN point_amount WHEN type = 2 THEN -point_amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) FROM Point WHERE user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BINARY, javaType=java.util.UUID}
